panels.title: Total Tickets Analyzed
panels.description: Total tickets in analysis period (Jul 1 - Oct 13, 2025)

panels.title: Automation Opportunities
panels.description: Tickets identified with automation potential across all patterns

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as "Automation Candidates"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND (
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%motion%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%sensor%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%patch%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%update fail%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%vpn%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%network%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure%resource%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure health%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%ssl%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%certificate%expir%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%'
);

panels.title: Automation Coverage %
panels.description: Percentage of tickets that could be automated

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * 
    SUM(CASE WHEN (
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%motion%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%sensor%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%patch%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%update fail%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%vpn%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%network%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure%resource%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure health%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%ssl%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%certificate%expir%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' OR
      "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%'
    ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2
  ) as "Coverage %"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13';

panels.title: Annual Savings Potential
panels.description: Estimated annual cost savings from automation (based on $80/hr avg, 2hr avg resolution)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  '$' || ROUND(
    COUNT(*) * 1.0 / 104 * 365 * 2.0 * 80 / 1000, 0
  ) || 'K' as "Annual Savings"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND (
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%motion%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%sensor%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%patch%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%update fail%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%vpn%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%network%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure%resource%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure health%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%ssl%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%certificate%expir%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%'
);

panels.title: Quick Wins (Motion Alerts)
panels.description: Motion/Sensor alerts - highest volume, easiest to automate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as "Motion/Sensor Tickets"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%motion%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%sensor%');

panels.title: Status: Pre-Automation
panels.description: Baseline state - automation implementations will update this

panels.title: Ticket Volume Trend (Daily)
panels.description: Total tickets created per day - shows workload over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('day', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Total Tickets"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Automation Candidates"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND (
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%motion%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%sensor%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%patch%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%update fail%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%vpn%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%network%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure%resource%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure health%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%ssl%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%certificate%expir%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' OR
  "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%'
)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Top 5 Automation Opportunities (By Volume)
panels.description: Highest volume patterns with estimated annual savings

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%motion%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%sensor%' THEN 'Motion/Sensor Alerts'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' THEN 'Access/Permission Requests'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure%resource%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure health%' THEN 'Azure Resource Health'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%patch%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%update fail%' THEN 'Patch Deployment Failures'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' THEN 'Email/Mailbox Issues'
  END as "Pattern",
  COUNT(*) as "Ticket Count",
  '$' || ROUND(COUNT(*) * 1.0 / 104 * 365 * 2.0 * 80 / 1000, 0) || 'K' as "Est. Annual Savings"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND (
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%motion%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%sensor%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure%resource%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%azure health%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%patch%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%update fail%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%')
)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 5;
